Description: BambooHR is all-in-one HR software made for small and medium businesses. BambooHR makes it easy to collect, maintain, and analyze your people data, improve the way you hire talent, onboard new employees, manage compensation, and develop your company culture.
Name: BambooHR

Methods.Name: List Updated Time Off Requests
Methods.Description: Retrieves Time Off Requests that have been created or updated since the last time this successfully ran. Only Time Off Requests set to start between 1 month ago and 6 months in the future will be examined.

Methods.Name: List Direct Deposit Accounts
Methods.Description: Retrieves an employee's direct deposit information.

Methods.Name: List New Employees
Methods.Description: Retrieves employees whose records have been created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: Get Employee
Methods.Description: Retrieves information about the specified employee.

Methods.Name: List Updated Employees
Methods.Description: Retrieves employees whose records have changed since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Deleted Employees
Methods.Description: Retrieves employees whose records have been deleted since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: Update Employee
Methods.Description: Updates information about the specified employee.

Methods.Name: List New, Updated and Deleted Employees
Methods.Description: Retrieves employees whose records have changed since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Employee Dependents
Methods.Description: Retrieves all of an employees dependents.

Methods.Name: Employee Updated
Methods.Description: Webhook that is fired when an employee record is updated in BambooHR.
